title: Updated 4 bed with office avail for August Move in !
map_address: 5980 S Helena Ct near Parker road
posting_body: ['5980 S Helena Ct  Centennial, CO  80016', '$3395.00 / Month', '---------------------------', 'Interested in this property?', 'Reply to this listing for more information.', '---------------------------', 'Property Details:', '4 BEDROOMS | 3.5 BATHROOMS', 'This beautiful home in Piney Creek with a traditional layout with office space on the main and 4 beds up has the space you need and desire.', 'Spacious kitchen with updated appliances and cozy family room with a gas fireplace and built in surround sound.', 'Laundry room on main level and powder room.', 'Upstairs are all of the bedrooms with a large master suite.', 'At nearly 4,500 square feet with unfinished basement for storage.', 'There is a rare  3-car garage and with a yard backing to a greenbelt, there is plenty of space for outdoor activities to enjoy Colorado weather.', 'Brand new paint, brand new carpet, roof/A/C/water heater/attic fan.', ' Owner may consider a pet on case by case basis with additional deposit.', 'Long term lease desired.', 'Move in  August 12+ month lease.', 'Qualifications good credit, good rental or mortgage history, income 3 x rent monthly and references.', 'See the video tour attached at the bottom of photos.', 'No more than two non-related tenants allowed.', 'Access to rec center with pool.', '***Large Dogs, Small Dogs, Cats Allowed***', 'Property Type:', 'Single Family', 'Lease Terms:', '$3395.00/Month', '$3400.00 Deposit', 'Lease Length:', 'One Year', 'Available:', '08/01/2022', 'Unit Amenities:', 'Dishwasher', 'Freezer', 'Garbage Disposal', 'Microwave', 'Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Dryer', 'Washer', 'Building Amenities:', 'Cable Ready', 'Fenced Yard', 'Fireplace', 'Garage', 'Washer Dryer Hookups', 'Lawn', 'Near Parks', 'Off Street Parking', 'Wired For Internet', 'Swimming Pool', '---------------------------', 'Interested in this property?', 'Reply to this listing for more information.']
